name: Hay School Development Tasks
description: Comprehensive task breakdown based on Hay School specifications for Malagasy children's educational platform

tasks.title: Set up project infrastructure and development environment
tasks.description: Configure development environment with proper tooling, version control, and basic project structure

tasks.title: Implement 6 core subject modules (Math, French, Sciences, History, Geography, English)
tasks.description: Create consistent learning patterns and navigation structure for all 6 subjects with Malagasy curriculum alignment
requirements: FR-001: 6 core subjects with consistent patterns

tasks.title: Develop child profile creation and management system
tasks.description: Create user profile system for children with age, preferences, and skill level tracking

tasks.title: Implement progress tracking and visual indicators
tasks.description: Build system to track individual progress across all subjects with visual progress bars and achievements

tasks.title: Create adaptive difficulty system based on child's skill level
tasks.description: Implement algorithm to adjust content difficulty based on child's demonstrated performance and age

tasks.title: Implement offline-first architecture for core learning content
tasks.description: Ensure all core learning content works without internet connection using service workers and caching
requirements: FR-005: Offline access to core content

tasks.title: Integrate Malagasy cultural context throughout platform
tasks.description: Add Malagasy cultural elements, examples, and context to all subjects and interactions

tasks.title: Create parent monitoring and goal-setting features
tasks.description: Build optional parental controls for monitoring progress and setting learning goals

boards.name: Interactive Learning System
boards.description: Engaging interactive learning experiences and feedback systems

tasks.title: Implement multiple interactive learning formats
tasks.description: Create visual, auditory, and kinesthetic learning activities (drag-drop, matching, audio interactions)

tasks.title: Build immediate encouraging feedback system
tasks.description: Create system that provides instant, positive feedback for all user actions and quiz answers

tasks.title: Develop visual progress indicators and motivation system
tasks.description: Create progress bars, completion indicators, and motivational elements to encourage continued learning

tasks.title: Implement achievement and reward system
tasks.description: Build badges, milestones, and celebration system for completed learning activities

tasks.title: Create contextual help system for struggling children
tasks.description: Implement system that detects when children need help and provides contextual assistance

tasks.title: Implement learning pattern tracking and analysis
tasks.description: Track how children learn and identify areas needing reinforcement or different approaches

tasks.title: Create varied activity types to maintain engagement
tasks.description: Develop different types of learning activities to prevent boredom and maintain interest

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive safety and appropriateness validation
tasks.description: Ensure all interactive elements are safe, age-appropriate, and child-friendly

boards.name: Chatbot Assistance System
boards.description: AI-powered learning support and contextual help

tasks.title: Implement core chatbot functionality with contextual help
tasks.description: Create chatbot system that provides help related to current learning activities and subjects

tasks.title: Develop age-appropriate language and response system
tasks.description: Create response system that uses simple, encouraging French appropriate for children aged 6-12

tasks.title: Build conversation context maintenance system
tasks.description: Implement system to maintain conversation context throughout learning sessions and subjects

tasks.title: Integrate Malagasy cultural context into chatbot responses
tasks.description: Add Malagasy cultural references, examples, and context to all chatbot explanations and interactions

tasks.title: Implement multiple ways to interact with chatbot
tasks.description: Create text input, voice interaction, and button-based interaction modes for accessibility

tasks.title: Develop system to encourage independent thinking
tasks.description: Create responses that guide children toward independent problem-solving while providing necessary help

tasks.title: Implement help request pattern tracking and analysis
tasks.description: Track when and why children request help to identify learning gaps and improve content

tasks.title: Ensure consistent responses across different subjects
tasks.description: Maintain consistent quality and approach in chatbot responses across all 6 subjects

tasks.title: Implement comprehensive content safety and filtering
tasks.description: Create filters to ensure all chatbot responses are safe, appropriate, and child-friendly

boards.name: Quality Assurance & Testing
boards.description: Testing, validation, and quality assurance tasks

tasks.title: Conduct comprehensive accessibility testing (WCAG 2.1 AA)
tasks.description: Test all features for screen reader compatibility, keyboard navigation, and accessibility standards

tasks.title: Performance testing on target devices and networks
tasks.description: Test application performance on low-end devices and 2G networks to ensure < 3s load times

tasks.title: Validate cultural appropriateness with Malagasy educators
tasks.description: Review all content with Malagasy educators and cultural experts for appropriateness and relevance

tasks.title: Child psychology and pedagogy expert review
tasks.description: Have child psychologists review all interactive elements and learning approaches

tasks.title: Test offline functionality across all features
tasks.description: Verify that all core learning features work properly without internet connection

tasks.title: Conduct security audit for child safety
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive security audit focusing on child data protection and platform safety

tasks.title: Conduct user acceptance testing with target age group
tasks.description: Test platform with children aged 6-12 in controlled environment to validate usability and engagement

tasks.title: Integrate parent feedback and monitoring features
tasks.description: Test and refine parent monitoring features with real parent feedback
